File use: Configure the migration of a set of files in a *data repo* whose data models are defined by the same schema in a *schema repo*
File location: Stored in the :obj:`migrations` directory in the *schema repo*, which is automatically created if necessary
Filename format: ``data_schema_migration_conf--{}--{}--{}.yaml``, where format placeholders are replaced with 1) the name of the *data repo*, 2) the name of the *schema repo*, and 3) a datetime value
